name: OUNGA
startIntroPart1: Daria Igazi, proud goddess of both thurths and lies, you were born to take this throne and leader with your fists, this is the moment of truth, defeat all the cruel monkeys that live on this world.
declaringWar: Listen, i must dye my hair again, i will use your blood for it.
attacked: And i thought you had a brain.
defeated: Hahahahaha, you defeated me, but i will live in your nightmares
introduction: Bow upon me and the OUNGA, mortal.
neutralHello: Hi, what can i get you?
uniques: [+25]% to Flank Attack bonuses <during a Golden Age>
